channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Sotomayor, Barrett encourage civility in front of nation’s governors.

item.description: Why Republicans Are Making a Big Mistake on Biden’s Age.

item.description: Reddit is getting ready to go public.
item.source:markdown: Reddit is getting ready to go public.

item.description: Arc browser’s new AI-powered ‘pinch-to-summarize’ feature is clever.
item.source:markdown: Arc browser’s new AI-powered ‘pinch-to-summarize’ feature is clever.

item.description: I've heard a lot of good things about the Arc browser. They have a blog, but no feed linked into the blog's home page. It's important.
item.source:markdown: I've heard a lot of good things about the Arc browser. They have a blog, but no feed linked into the blog's home page. It's important.

item.description: How to freeze-dry a website.
item.source:markdown: How to freeze-dry a website.

item.description: Who is Robert Hur, special counsel in Biden documents case?
item.source:markdown: Who is Robert Hur, special counsel in Biden documents case?

item.description: Special counsel describes Biden as ‘elderly man with a poor memory’ in eyebrow-raising report.
item.source:markdown: Special counsel describes Biden as ‘elderly man with a poor memory’ in eyebrow-raising report.

item.description: Biden impeachment effort on the brink of collapse, because it was 100% bullshit, it never should have been given any credence by journalism.
item.source:markdown: Biden impeachment effort on the brink of collapse, because it was 100% bullshit, it never should have been given any credence by journalism.

item.description: A view into how our supposedly trustworthy journalists deal with exposing their own corruption. They don’t.
item.source:markdown: A view into how our supposedly trustworthy journalists deal with exposing their own corruption. They don’t.

item.description: The truth about trump is that while he might claim a huge net worth, it’s all mortgaged, many times, fraudulently, so the banks could repossess all of it, but haven’t for fear of having it all crash, and them getting pennies on the dollar.
item.source:markdown: The truth about trump is that while he might claim a huge net worth, it’s all mortgaged, many times, fraudulently, so the banks could repossess all of it, but haven’t for fear of having it all crash, and them getting pennies on the dollar.

item.description: Vice is abandoning Vice.com and laying off hundreds.

item.description: Am I the first to subscribe to the new Megnut? 😀
item.source:markdown: Am I the first to subscribe to the new Megnut? 😀

item.description: Great news, Megnut is going to start blogging again. Nice!
item.source:markdown: Great news, Megnut is going to start blogging again. Nice!

item.description: Google apologizes for ‘missing the mark’ after Gemini generated racially diverse Nazis.
item.source:markdown: Google apologizes for ‘missing the mark’ after Gemini generated racially diverse Nazis.

item.description: Farhad Manjoo, columnist at the NYT, has an RSS feed, but it hasn't updated in a long time. Whatever became of him? Did he retire? He will be missed.
item.source:markdown: Farhad Manjoo, columnist at the NYT, has an RSS feed, but it hasn't updated in a long time. Whatever became of him? Did he retire? He will be missed.

item.description: Does anyone have a current feed for fivethirtyeight.com?
item.source:markdown: Does anyone have a current feed for fivethirtyeight.com?

item.description: Logseq, a company I thought so much of I invested, had a blog but hasn't updated since August last year. How does such a young entrepreneurial excellent company keep in touch with their users and friends?
item.source:markdown: Logseq, a company I thought so much of I invested, had a blog but hasn't updated since August last year. How does such a young entrepreneurial _excellent_ company keep in touch with their users and friends?

item.description: Another blog that hasn't updated in quite some time, JOHO the Blog by David Weinberger, a Cluetrain author and longtime friend. If the blogosphere is to reboot, we'll need some love from Dr Dave.
item.source:markdown: Another blog that hasn't updated in quite some time, JOHO the Blog by David Weinberger, a Cluetrain author and longtime friend. If the blogosphere is to reboot, we'll need some love from Dr Dave.

item.description: Another feed, Megnut, hasn't updated since 2013. A founder of the company that created Blogger.
item.source:markdown: Another feed, Megnut, hasn't updated since 2013\. A founder of the company that created Blogger.

item.description: I'm trimming my subscription list, removing feeds that haven't updated since last summer, and noticed that Joel On Software is one. He's one of the prolific influential bloggers.
item.source:markdown: I'm trimming my subscription list, removing feeds that haven't updated since last summer, and noticed that Joel On Software is one. He's one of the prolific influential bloggers.

item.description: A Russian Military Blogger Dies After Criticizing Army Losses.
item.source:markdown: A Russian Military Blogger Dies After Criticizing Army Losses.

item.description: In search of a digital town square.
item.source:markdown: In search of a digital town square.

item.description: We haven't even gotten started, but at least now we're starting to get started. ;-)
item.source:markdown: We haven't even gotten started, but at least now we're starting to get started. ;-)

item.description: “Women who actually know what happened, they feel under attack and almost powerless.”
item.source:markdown: “Women who actually know what happened, they feel under attack and almost powerless.”

item.description: Moscow Mitch will be first to go to the gulag.
item.source:markdown: Moscow Mitch will be first to go to the gulag.

item.description: Is the New York Times neutral on the future of democracy?
item.source:markdown: Is the New York Times neutral on the future of democracy?

item.description: How Twitter’s descent into chaos is paving the way for a new web. (I don't agree that Twitter has descended into chaos, but it is time for a new web.)
item.source:markdown: How Twitter’s descent into chaos is paving the way for a new web. (I don't agree that Twitter has descended into chaos, but it _is_ time for a new web.)

item.description: Harvard Crimson: New York Times, Get out of My School.
item.source:markdown: Harvard Crimson: New York Times, Get out of My School.

item.description: Breaking Bad in one minute.
item.source:markdown: Breaking Bad in one minute.

item.description: You gotta wonder if journalists could find some actual news to write about.
item.source:markdown: You gotta wonder if journalists could find some actual news to write about.

item.description: I really don't believe Trump is our problem. I think the problem is journalism.
item.source:markdown: I really don't believe Trump is our problem. I think the problem is journalism.

item.description: Another bullshit story concocted by the NYT. I'm not there now, but I don't believe for a second that there's any unusual antisemitism at Harvard.
item.source:markdown: Another bullshit story concocted by the NYT. I'm not there now, but I don't believe for a second that there's any unusual antisemitism at Harvard.

item.description: Fastest-Growing Black Hole Is Eating a Sun Per Day. (That's a pretty good headline!)
item.source:markdown: Fastest-Growing Black Hole Is Eating a Sun Per Day. (That's a pretty good headline!)

item.description: 5G is eating cable’s lunch.
item.source:markdown: 5G is eating cable’s lunch.

item.description: I think it's wrong to say Mastodon is a Twitter rival. It's not what it is. It's something different.
item.source:markdown: I think it's wrong to say Mastodon is a Twitter rival. It's not what it is. It's something different.

item.description: I was writing a story about sizing ski boots and asked ChatGPT to make an illustration for the story for me.

item.description: Why The New York Times might win its copyright lawsuit against OpenAI.
item.source:markdown: Why The New York Times might win its copyright lawsuit against OpenAI.

item.description: Millions of us see the problem. What are we going to do about it??
item.source:markdown: Millions of us see the problem. What are we going to do about it??

item.description: Measles erupts in Florida school where 11% of kids are unvaccinated.
item.source:markdown: Measles erupts in Florida school where 11% of kids are unvaccinated.
